query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZLET006 ( MANDT, ZKNUM, ZKNUM2, ZTYPE, ZTON1, ZTON2, ZTON3, ZTON4, ZTON5, ZTON6, ZTON7, ZTON8, ZTON9, ZTON10, ZTON11, ZTON12, ZTON13, ZTON14, ZTON15, LIFNR, ZHYUN, ERDAT, ERZET, DPTEN, UPTEN, TPLST, ZADDRESS, LIFNR2, BEZEI, TPLST2, BEZEI2, ZTEXT, ZCANC, ZCHAN, ZTRANS, ZOUTDAT, ZOUTZET, ZINDAT, ZINZET, ERNAM, ZCONF, AEDAT, UZEIT, AENAM, LAEDA, CHANGE_TIME, ZTRCOST, ZPERNM, ZCARNO, MBLNR, BELNR, ZFULLSET2 ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, #ZKNUM#, #ZKNUM2#, '12', #ZTON1#, #ZTON2#, #ZTON3#, #ZTON4#, #ZTON5#, #ZTON6#, #ZTON7#, #ZTON8#, #ZTON9#, #ZTON10#, #ZTON11#, #ZTON12#, #ZTON13#, #ZTON14#, #ZTON15#, #LIFNR#, #ZHYUN#, #ERDAT#, #ERZET#, #DPTEN#, #UPTEN#, #TPLST#, '', '', #BEZEI#, '', '', #ZTEXT#, '', '', '', '00000000', '000000', '00000000', '000000', #G_USER_ID#, '', HEX(CURRENT DATE), HEX(CURRENT TIME), '', '00000000', '000000', #ZTRCOST#, '', '', '', '', #ZFULLSET2# )
